website_summaries.verdict: Contains retinol, a substance touted as the fountain of youth, to visibly reduce lines.
pros: A “game changer” that leaves skin bright and noticeably more radiant
Works well to reduce the appearance of large pores and uneven skin
Contains kinds of retinol plus peptide-rich red algae extract to improve elasticity
cons: Not much product in the jar

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for at least 5 months. No noticeable improvements. Packaging is not used friendly. You press down and even though there is more than ample contents inside it doesn't pump up. You have to then unscrew the top and reposition the product. Bad part is that you then waste the products or get too much.
customer_reviews.author: kittykat

customer_reviews.title: No side effects
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok , I’ve been using it for two weeks and don’t see any results . A bit disappointing due to it being on the pricier side. I mostly likely will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and will order again. I use it with Murad vitamin drops ($72) - expensive but worth it. My skin feels fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Aphrodite

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 5 weeks and I see a big difference in my skin and fine lines!! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this night cream. I gave it a shot just to try “an expensive” night cream and it turned out that it works the best for my skin. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin super soft. Most Night creams are too Heavy for my skin type but this one is perfect. I can tell when I use it and when I miss a few days I love this product so much that I’ve stared sending the travel sizes to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good go-to night cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream makes your skin look super bright and vibrant, doesn’t leave your skin oily or irritated like other brands. I definitely noticed a difference after using it for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: DId not make a difference as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is the first Murad product I have used that I am not satisfied with.. I see no difference in my skin since I purchased it less than 6 weeks ago. I would like to return but it appears I missed the window for return.. Truly disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Laura Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, smells nice and the price is fair.
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of this cream and I love it. I have super sensitive skin and have not noticed a problem. It has a nice sent, great packaging and the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I have been using the Murad line religiously for about 2 years now and get many compliments on my skin. The bottle needs work as pump can’t reach all the product so need to unscrew the cap to reach the remaining but product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rena M.

customer_reviews.title: I also like the dispenser you can control how much you use
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it and I've already seen results. I also like the dispenser you can control how much you use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for my skin and it is pricey too!
customer_reviews.author: N. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: More than met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Murad Retinol Youth Renewal Night Cream seems to be a more advanced night cream and my skin seems smoother already. My purchase arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Eisenecher

customer_reviews.title: Nothing was in my package!  Do not charge me for this.
customer_reviews.text: I received this package but it was empty. My Murad was not in the package. Please resend and do not charge me. Let me know what proof you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great nightly retinol lotion
customer_reviews.text: Great nightly retinol lotion. Feels smooth and the smell is amazing. I have been using it to stave off file lines in conjunction with Botox and have been happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great night cream. It’s light and very moisturizing. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I like the push lid dispenser, I feel like I waste less product too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I sampled this cream through Ipsy and fell in love with it, I have a decently clear face but am prone to breakouts and it has really helped renew my face! I love the product and have recommended it to many of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: A_Spence

customer_reviews.title: Wait! This actually works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even believe this! I know this brand is good, but I’ve been frustrated with my skin this winter and just thought age was catching up with me. I’ve literally been using this for ONE WEEK and I see a difference. I’m never compelled to write a review, but felt people should know about this magic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace White

customer_reviews.title: Early 40’s-Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my early forties, and this is a wonderful night cream for my face. It makes me face soft without being oily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks worse after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 months now. My skin actually looks worse. The texture of my skin has declined and the skin under my eyes is far more crepey.
customer_reviews.author: PNWcs
